box_file_added: A user added a file to Box in a project
box_file_removed: A user removed a file from Box in a project
box_file_updated: A user updated a file in Box in a project
box_folder_created: A user created a folder in Box in a project
box_folder_selected: A user linked a Box folder to a project
box_node_authorized: A user authorized the Box addon for a project
box_node_deauthorized: A user deauthorized the Box addon for a project
box_node_deauthorized_no_user: Box addon for a project deauthorized
